analyzed: praṇidhāya manaḥ saha indriyaiḥ vidhivat vāc ca
guṇa bhūta mahā guṇa udadheḥ tava vakṣyāmi guṇa eka deśa tām
parama artha vid a prakampitaḥ prayataiḥ
caraṇa su samāptam eva te su samāpta vrata
balavān ca samādhiḥ avyayaḥ tava nārāyaṇa śailarāja vat

original: puruṣaṣabha nāsti te vyathā na viṣādo na bhayaṁ
analyzed: puruṣa ṣabha na asti te vyathā na viṣādaḥ na bhaya

original: na ca te vyasanaṁ kutaḥ kalirna ca bhūteṣu
analyzed: na ca te vyasana kutas kaliḥ na ca bhūteṣu

original: na ca dhāvasi nātilīyase na ca santapyasi nāpi
analyzed: na ca dhāvasi na atilīyase na ca santapyasi nā api
satata śubham eva te manaḥ satata

original: na ca te'sti mune kathaṁ kathā vimatirnāsti na
analyzed: na ca te asti mune katha kathā vimatiḥ nā asti na

original: svayameva na te parāparaṁ viditaṁ sarvamavedi
analyzed: svayam eva na te parāpara vidita sarvam avedi
samam eva hi te priya apriya satata
madhura pratibhānavān asi smita vākyaḥ smṛtamān

original: vividānumataṁ prabhāṣase triṣu lokeṣu ca te stṛtaṁ
analyzed: vivida anumata prabhāṣase triṣu lokeṣu ca te stṛta
nṛ sura asura yakṣa rākṣasāḥ bahavaḥ tvām iha loka paṇḍitāḥ

original: upagamya mune punaḥ punaḥ paripṛcchānti na
analyzed: upagamya mune punar punar paripṛcchānti na
sva vacaḥ paritoṣitāḥ tvayā naradevāḥ sura yakṣa rākṣasāḥ
pratiyānti vinīta saśayāḥ caraṇau vandya ca te
atha cīvara pātra dhāraṇa rucira gautama
balavān asi loka viśrutaḥ puruṣa jñaḥ puruṣa ṛṣabhaḥ

original: na ca manyasi nāvamanyase sakalaṁ lokamimaṁ
na ca vismayase kadācana prakṛtistheṣu calācaleṣu ca |
analyzed: na ca vismayase kadācana prakṛti stheṣu cala acaleṣu ca

original: suhṛdeṣu [ ca ] durhṛdeṣu ca pratikūleṣvanulomavatsu ca ||15 ||
analyzed: suhṛdeṣu ca durhṛdeṣu ca pratikūleṣu anulomavatsu ca
prasamīkṣya jagat vividhaiḥ duḥkha śataiḥ upadrutam
cira rātram anātham utsuka bhava tṛṣṇā prasṛta
avatārya muneḥ mahā kṛpā vividhā ca ātma gatā
svayam eva hi śākya puṅgava vyathitān mocayitu
ativīrya mahā vināyaka pravarāṇām anuvādinā vara

original: na ca te sadṛśaḥ kuto'dhikastriṣu lokeṣvapi
analyzed: na ca te sadṛśaḥ kutodhikaḥ triṣu lokeṣu api

original: pratighānunayā na santi te na ca te santi muni
analyzed: pratigha anunayāḥ na santi te na ca te santi muni
anurodha virodha vigrahāḥ satata suvrata nā eva

original: apahāya mune priyāpriye sukhaduḥkhe vi [ ṣamaṁ samaṁ tathā ]
analyzed: apahāya mune priya apriye sukha duḥkhe vi sama sama tathā
a rati ca rati viparyayan upaśāntaḥ carasi iha sayataḥ

original: vyasane na ca nāma nirmanā na ca nāmonnamase
analyzed: vyasane na ca nāma nirmanāḥ na ca nāma unnamase
ayaśaḥ ca yaśaḥ ca te sama samam ākruṣṭam atha api
samara agra gataḥ viṣāṇavān bhṛśa muktān iva kuñjaraḥ
suvacaḥ tvam ṛṣi vacaḥ kṣamaḥ su durukteṣu api

original: samameva ca varttase mune paribhāṣāsu śubhāsu
analyzed: samam eva ca varttase mune paribhāṣāsu śubhāsu
satata ca vara arha pūjyase nara deva asura yakṣa rākṣasaiḥ

original: ṛṣibhiśca sadā mahātmabhirna ca te vikriyate
analyzed: ṛṣibhiḥ ca sadā mahātmabhiḥ na ca te vikriyate

original: sadṛśo'hamito na manyase trividhā mānavidhā na
analyzed: sadṛśaḥ uham itas na manyase trividhāḥ māna vidhāḥ na

hima bhāskara raśmi sagama acchiśira uṣṇa pavana
adhivāsayase naga indra vat na ca te pravyathate
adhivāsayase naga indra vat na ca te pravyathate

original: na ha śocāsi nātha nāsti me na ca te santi mune
analyzed: na ha śocāsi nātha na asti me na ca te santi mune
asitaḥ asi su vākya nirmamaḥ parimuktaḥ vividhaiḥ upadravaiḥ

original: na ca lābhamavāpya hṛṣyase tadalābhācca layaṁ
analyzed: na ca lābham avāpya hṛṣyase tad alābhāt ca laya

original: asayo niśitāḥ śarāśca te na vikurvanti manaḥ
analyzed: asayaḥ niśitāḥ śarāḥ ca te na vikurvanti manaḥ

original: na kathāṁ kathayasyanarthikāṁ na ca yā
analyzed: na kathā kathayasi anarthikā na ca yā

original: na [ ca lābhakathā na ] sāmiṣā na ca yā nānumatā mahātmabhiḥ ||34 ||
analyzed: na ca lābha kathā na sa āmiṣā na ca yā na anumatā mahātmabhiḥ

original: madhurāṇi ca saṅgatāni ca svabhinītāni ca
analyzed: madhurāṇi ca saṅgatāni ca su abhinītāni ca

original: piśunāḥ paruṣā śaṭhāśca ye bhagavaṁstaiḥ saha
analyzed: piśunāḥ paruṣā śaṭhāḥ ca ye bhagavas taiḥ saha

original: aśaṭhā ṛjavaśca ye narāḥ śucayaḥ satyaratā
analyzed: a śaṭhāḥ ṛjavaḥ ca ye narāḥ śucayaḥ satya ratā

original: satataṁ ca samīkṣyakāriṇo bhagavaṁstaiḥ saha saṅgataṁ
analyzed: satata ca samīkṣyakāriṇaḥ bhagavaḥ taiḥ saha

original: dharmajña nayajña pudralajña tvāṁ vande ṣaḍabhijña
analyzed: dharma jña naya jña pudrala jña tvā vande ṣaḍabhijña

original: kṣetrajña mune parāparajña tvāṁ vande śirasā
analyzed: kṣetrajña mune para apara jña tvā vande śirasā

original: pṛthumapi samīkṣate guṇaṁ [ tava ] parikathito hi māa guṇaikadeśaḥ |
analyzed: pṛthum api samīkṣate guṇa tava parikathitaḥ hi guṇa eka deśaḥ
